text: Gilles Müller was the defending champion, but chose not to participate. Blaž Kavčič won the title, defeating André Ghem in the final, 7–5, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Gemdale ATP Challenger China International Shenzhen - Singles Category:Pingshan Open
title: 2015 Gemdale ATP Challenger China International Shenzhen – Singles
